text: Ovidio Messa Soruco (12 December 1952 - 27 July 2017) was a Bolivian footballer. He was born in Yacu√≠ba, Bolivia. He was known for playing for the Bolivia national football team from 1978 through 1979. Messa died on 27 July 2017 of pancreatic cancer in Alicante, Spain at the age of 64. ==References== ==Other websites== * Obituary: Ovidio Messa Category:1952 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Spain Category:Bolivian footballers
